00014 /*
00015 -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00016 Filename:    ExampleFrameListener.h
00017 Description: Defines an example frame listener which responds to frame events.
00018 This frame listener just moves a specified camera around based on
00019 keyboard and mouse movements.
00020 Mouse:    Freelook
00021 W or Up:  Forward
00022 S or Down:Backward
00023 A:        Step left
00024 D:        Step right
00025              PgUp:     Move upwards
00026              PgDown:   Move downwards
00027              F:        Toggle frame rate stats on/off
00028                          R:        Render mode
00029              T:        Cycle texture filtering
00030                        Bilinear, Trilinear, Anisotropic(8)
00031              P:        Toggle on/off display of camera position / orientation
00032 -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00033 */
00034 
00035 #ifndef __ExampleFrameListener_H__
00036 #define __ExampleFrameListener_H__
00037 
00038 #include <Ogre.h>
00039 class Cursor;
00040 class InputEvent;
00041 #include <OgreEventTarget.h>
00042 #include <OgreKeyEvent.h>
00043 #include <OgreInputEvent.h>
00044 #include <OgreEventQueue.h>
00045 #include <OgreEventListeners.h>
00046 #include <OgreEventTarget.h>
00047 #include <OgreInput.h>
00048 #include <OgreEventDispatcher.h>
00049 #include <OgreEventProcessor.h>
00050 #include <OgrePlatformManager.h>
00051 
00052 
00053 #include <logger.h>
00054 
00055 using namespace Ogre;
00056 
00057 namespace RainbruRPG{
00058   namespace Core{
00059 
00060     class ExampleFrameListener: public FrameListener, public KeyListener{
00061 
00062     public:
00063       // Constructor takes a RenderWindow because it uses 
00064       // that to determine input context
00065       ExampleFrameListener(RenderWindow*, Camera* ,  
00066                            bool useBufferedInputKeys = false, 
00067                            bool useBufferedInputMouse = false);
00068 
00069       virtual ~ExampleFrameListener();
00070 
00071       virtual bool processUnbufferedKeyInput(const FrameEvent& evt);
00072 
00073       bool processUnbufferedMouseInput(const FrameEvent& evt);
00074 
00075       virtual void moveCamera();
00076 
00077 //      void showDebugOverlay(bool show){ }
00078       
00079       // Override frameStarted event to process that 
00080       //(don't care about frameEnded)
00081       bool frameStarted(const FrameEvent& evt);
00082       
00083       void switchMouseMode();
00084       void switchKeyMode();
00085       void keyClicked(KeyEvent* e);
00086       
00088       void keyPressed(KeyEvent* e) {}
00090       void keyReleased(KeyEvent* e) {}
00091       
00092     protected:
00094       EventProcessor* mEventProcessor;
00096       InputReader* mInputDevice;
00098       Camera* mCamera;
00100       Vector3 mTranslateVector;
00102       RenderWindow* mWindow;
00104       bool mStatsOn;
00106       bool mUseBufferedInputKeys;
00108       bool mUseBufferedInputMouse;
00110       bool mInputTypeSwitchingOn;
00111 
00113       unsigned int mNumScreenShots;
00115       float mMoveScale;
00117       Degree mRotScale;
00119       Real mTimeUntilNextToggle;
00121       Radian mRotX;
00123       Radian mRotY;
00125       TextureFilterOptions mFiltering;
00127       int mAniso;
00129       int mSceneDetailIndex ;
00131       Real mMoveSpeed;
00133       Degree mRotateSpeed;
00134       
00135     };
00136   }
